vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13;
son of: Abihail (H0032I);
brother of: Michael (H4317H), Meshullam (H4918I), Sheba (H7652), Jorai (H3140), Jacan (H3275) and Eber (H5677H)
§ Zia = "tumult"
one of the Gadites who dwelt in Bashan
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細亞 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "喧嘩"
住在巴珊的一個迦得人(代上 5:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
细亚 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "喧哗"
住在巴珊的一个迦得人(代上 5:13)
